properties.entry: SELECT USER_ID , USER_NAME , PHONE , TO_CHAR(BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "BIRTHDAY" , EMAIL , ADDRESS , GITHUB_URL , NOTION_URL FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT A.USER_NO, TO_CHAR(A.DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "DAY", A.STATE_CODE, B.STATE_NAME, A.USE_DAY_OFF FROM ATTENDANCE A JOIN ATD_STATE B ON (A.STATE_CODE = B.STATE_CODE) WHERE USER_NO = ?
